dialog.line: Welcome, intern #772. You've been initialized for a critical task.
Our memory sectors are being corrupted by an unknown parasite.
You must traverse the mainframe and eliminate the threat before we lose everything.
Also, you here's a tip from me ...
Use the memory corruption to your advantage, remember that.
Beware of the lost ghosts though, they appear when you lose too much memory.
I'll be monitoring from CORE2, good luck.
